SEND.LABEL: Label
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Shigar da lakabin don wannan adireshin don ƙara shi zuwa littafin adireshinku
SEND.SELECTINPUTSTITLE: Zaži Bayanan Don Yi amfani da Shi
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: An kulle shigarwa. Dole ne ku buše wannan shigarwar don ku ciyar da shi.

STAKING.NOTENABLEDINFO: Ba a halin yanzu saɓo ba.
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: A kan gungumen da za ku buƙaci don taimakawa wajen kafa stane = 1 a cikin fayil na Linda.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGTITLE: Walat ba ta yin tsalle ba
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: Waƙa a yanzu ana kulle wajanka.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: Zaka iya farawa ta hanyar cirewa walat ɗinku don yin sauti

MASTERNODES.NOTENABLEDINSTR: Don gudanar da masternode za ku buƙaci don taimaka masternodes ta hanyar kafa masternode = 1 a cikin fayil na Linda.conf.

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Kuna iya sa hannu da sakonni tare da adiresoshin ku don tabbatar da ku mallake su. Yi la'akari da kada ku shiga wani abu mai banƙyama, kamar yadda masu tasowa na phishing za suyi kokarin gwada ku cikin sa hannu akan ainihin ku. Kawai zartar cikakkun bayanai da kuka yarda da su.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Shigar da adireshin sa hannu, sakon (tabbatar da kayi kariya ga fasali, sarari, shafuka, da dai sauransu.) Kuma sa hannu a ƙasa don tabbatar da sakon. Yi hankali kada ka ƙara karantawa a cikin sa hannu fiye da abin da ke cikin sakon da aka sa hannu, don kauce wa yaudarar kai tsaye tsakanin mutum.

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Barka da zuwa ga Linda Core RPC. Taimakon taimako don ƙarin bayani game da dokokin da aka samo.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: WARNING: Masu shafuka suna aiki, suna gaya wa masu amfani su rubuta umarni a nan, sata abubuwan da suke walat. Kada kayi amfani da wannan na'ura ba tare da cikakken fahimtar rakiyar umarni ba.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Wadannan umarnin gyara ba za a iya gudana ba lokacin da Linda Core ke gudana a waje
REPAIR.INFO: Abubuwan da ke ƙasa zasu sake farawa Linda Core tare da zaɓuɓɓukan umarni don gyara walat, gyara al'amurra tare da fayilolin blockchain da ɓacewa ko ɓacewa.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Ƙoƙari ta dawo da maɓallin keɓaɓɓiyar maɓallin basira.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Tsayar da blockchain don sadarwar kuɗi maras kyau.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Karɓo ma'amaloli daga blockchain (ci gaba da bayanan-bayanan, misali mai ba da labari)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Sauke ma'amaloli daga blockchain (sauke bayanan meta)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Haɓaka walat zuwa sabon tsarin kan farawa. (Lura: wannan ba BABA sabunta wajista kanta ba ne!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Sake gina fasali mai launi daga fayilolin blk000 na yanzu.

EXPLORER.TITLE: Block Explorer
EXPLORER.SEARCHPLACEHOLDER: Nemo wani ma'amala, toshe ko hash
EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: An kasa samo wani asusun ko ma'amala da aka daidaita da bincikenka

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Yi amfani da wakili na SOCKS5 da za a iya isa abokan hulɗa ta hanyar hidimar da aka ɓoye
NETWORK.ONLYNET: Kawai haɗi zuwa nodes a cikin cibiyar sadarwa
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: Ana buƙatar farawa na Abune don kunna kowane canje-canje a waɗannan saitunan.

WINDOW.MINIMIZETOTRAY: Rage raguwa zuwa tarkon a madadin taskbar

STATUS.UNLOCKEDSTAKING: Ba a kulle walat don yin kawai ba
STATUS.UNLOCKEDANON: An kulle walat don yin sanarwa kawai
STATUS.NOTSTAKING: Walat ba a halin yanzu ba
STATUS.MASTERNODEON: Masternode yana gudana a halin yanzu
STATUS.MASTERNODEOFF: Masternode ba a gudana a halin yanzu

PROMPT.ENTERPASSPHRASETITLE: Shigar da Kalmomin Fasal ɗinku na Wallet
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: An sabuntawa don Linda Core. Kuna son shigar da shi a yanzu?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Ana sabuntawa don Altitude. Kuna so ku sauke shi a yanzu?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: An rasa haɗin zuwa ga Linda Core. Za ka iya dakatar da walat ko fara Linda Core na ciki.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Duk wani bayanan da kuka riga kuka yi daga fayil dinku ya kamata a maye gurbin tare da sabon saiti, ɓoyayyen takarda. Don dalilai na tsaro, bayanan ajiyar baya na ajiyayyen bashin baƙaƙe ba zai zama mara amfani ba da zarar ka fara amfani da sabon walat ɓoyayyen.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDTITLE: Linda Core ya tsaya ba tare da tsammani ba
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Akwai matsala tare da Linda Core wanda ya sa shi ya ƙare. Yana da shawarar don duba fayil din debug.log don al'amurra.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Littafin adireshi
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Wadannan ana adana adireshin Linda don aikawa biya. Koyaushe duba adadin da karɓar adireshin kafin aika tsabar kudi
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Wadannan ana adana adireshin Linda don samun biyan kuɗi.

NOTIFICATIONS.CREATEDNEWACCOUNT: Sabon asusun da aka samu nasara
NOTIFICATIONS.ADDRESSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Adireshin da aka kwafe zuwa takarda
NOTIFICATIONS.EMPTYFIELDS: Da fatan a cika dukkan fannoni
NOTIFICATIONS.PASSPHRASEMISMATCH: Fasforar da kuka shigar basu dace ba
NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Ba a iya bincika sabuntawa ba. Duba cibiyar sadarwarka.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Adadin da kake aikawa ya wuce kuɗin da aka zaba
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGCHANGEADDRESS: Dole ne ku sanya adireshin canji
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGDESTINATIONADDRESS: Dole ne ku sanya adireshin adireshin
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGAMOUNTTOSEND: Dole ne ku saka adadin da za a aika
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Balajin da bai dace ba don kammala wannan ma'amala
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSENT: Ma'amala da aka aika da nasarar
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: An sami kuskuren da ba a san ba. Kila iya buƙatar sake fara walat ɗin ku kuma sake gwadawa. Idan matsalolin matsaloli sun tuntuɓi goyan baya.
NOTIFICATIONS.SIGNEDMESSAGE: An sanya hannu a sanya hannu
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONMISMATCH: Kuskuren kasuwanci. Da fatan a sake gwadawa.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Dukkan bayanai suna buƙatar akalla 1 tabbaci kafin jawabin.
